First off, I want to say I'm sorry for losing my temper a bit. Second, I'd send this message personally if there was a way.

I love this game. I think the people who designed and built it did an amazing job. As a game designer myself, I know how hard coming up with an original setup like this is. And I just want to help, and make jokes, and be social and have fun, but I don't want to be constantly afraid of slipping up and saying the wrong thing, so I don't know what to do.

Is it possible I could get a list of the future updates (or at least things you don't want me to mention) so I can try not to bring them up in conversation? Or if everything is on the French wiki somewhere, I will go read that. While getting spoilers myself would suck half the fun out of the game, I honestly don't want to spoil things for other people either - I'm just simply enthusiastic and on a board described as a suggestion box, it's hard not to make suggestions that seem like fairly obvious improvements. And in the other forums, its hard not to make the obvious jokes. :/

I'm actually pretty sure I'll get banned for this, but there's not exactly any other way to communicate with you, and I've always had a problem just letting things lie on bad words.

Again, I'm sorry. Wish you guys the best of luck and hope your game does well.
-The Griffin

The german version is only slightly ahead of us, but not for long... There are only 5 days to go until season 2...and new stuff!

The french server has more content, but it has been going for 2 yrs, as opposed to our 5 months. Don't worry though, there's so much coming that you'll need to keep your wits about you, assuming of course that you don't want to die2nite...

That's the most in depth answer Epoq has provided since the game started so really can't ask for a better answer

Have patience, young Padawan
